full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME LHA MCHOD PA DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHOD AIM CHE BKA' BCU DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN SEMS KYIS SOG YUL 'DI ME LHA MCHOD CING @009B GA-YANG BLANG BAS BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA MA BSKYED PA'I MCHOD PA'I BYIN BRLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LTAR CAN GYIS LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MED, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR GTOR CHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THABS BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMAS MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN MO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' BSTUS NAS, RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYI GA-YAR KHRAL DU DBANG PHYUG ZHES ME MO GLANG GI HOR ZLA BA BCU PA'I CHOS BZANG POR 'GRIGS PA'O, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I GNONGS PA CI MCHID PA, ,BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS ZHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PA GANG THOB DES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
